Serpentor/Nemesis Enforcer:

::Nemesis Enforcer growled:: "Snake burgers for lunch!"  ::Nemesis pulled out 
his rapid-fire laser rifle, charging out of his quarters like a madman, 
heading for the onlly exit in the craft::

================================================================

::Serpentor looked to DevilDuer from behind, twisting around firing off a 
plasma blast (about 5 feet off to the left though) as he caught a laser blast 
in his side, the snake turning and running even faster::
